scriptLines:
query: '<fetch>
  <entity name='etl007_column'>
    <all-attributes />
    <link-entity name='etl007_table' to='etl007_tableid' from='etl007_tableid' alias='a' link-type='inner'>
      <filter>
        <condition attribute='etl007_displayname' operator='eq' value='Facility Unit' />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>') ~> source1
